name: setup-unocss

schema.title: Configures UnoCSS for an application or a library.
schema.description: Adds the UnoCSS configuration files for a given Vue project and installs, if needed, the packages required for UnoCSS to work.

examples.description: Initialize UnoCSS configuration for the `my-app` project.

project.description: The name of the project to add the UnoCSS setup for.
project.x-prompt: What project would you like to add the UnoCSS setup?

skipFormat.description: Skips formatting the workspace after the generator completes.

entrypoint.description: Path to the project entry point relative to the workspace root. This option is only needed if the entrypoint location cannot be found automatically.

description: Set up UnoCSS configuration for a project.
